Articles.Content: I was attempting to do my first KIS related thing, building a rover on Duna, I attempted to get the parts outside of the container but oh bill kerman has 1 l of inventory space! I heard having a higher level gives you more inventory space, but bill was at the highest level in the game! I need some help.

You can drag parts from the container directly to the outside world bypassing your kerbal's inventory, so long as they weigh under 1 ton. Even if they're very large volume.

Incidentally, I strongly suggest raising the mass limitation to 5 tons and increasing the reach distance a bit if using this mod a lot, to not pull your hair out or spend hours tediously arranging teams of kerbals on command chairs in a silly fashion.
